summary: Feature request to enable runtime replacement of the worker client with a new client instance that may be configured with different options (e.g., updated TLS certificates). This allows workers to reconnect with new credentials without restarting.
userImpact: Users cannot update worker client credentials or connection options at runtime without completely restarting the worker process.
keyQuote: Need to be able to replace the worker client with a new client that may be connected with different options (e.g. a new TLS cert).
